Class Subject

java.lang.Object
Subject
public class Subject
extends java.lang.Object
This class defines a Subject object. It provides all the properties and methods necessary to manage a subject in the bigger context of the School.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Giovanni Arcudi

  • Constructor Details

    • Subject

      public Subject​(int id, int specialism, int duration)
      Creates a new Subject object and initializes its name, ID, specialism, duration and prerequisites variables.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the subject
      specialism - the specialism ID of the subject
      duration - the duration (number of days) required for any course covering the subject
      Throws:
      InvalidInputException - If id, specialism and duration are not all positive integers

  • Method Details

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Subject's id accessor method.
      Returns:
      the unique ID of the subject

    • getSpecialism

      public int getSpecialism()
      Subject's specialism accessor method.
      Returns:
      the specialism ID of the subject

    • getDuration

      public int getDuration()
      Subject's duration accessor method.
      Returns:
      the duration (number of days) required for any course covering the subject

    • getDescription

      public java.lang.String getDescription()
      Subject's description accessor method.
      Returns:
      the string description of the subject

    • setDescription

      public void setDescription​(java.lang.String description)
      Subject's description setter method.
      Parameters:
      description - the string description of the subject

    • getPrerequisites

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getPrerequisites()
      Subject's prerequisites accessor method.
      Returns:
      the subjectIDs of the subjects you have to take before studying this subject

    • addPrerequisites

      public void addPrerequisites​(int prerequisite)
      Adds a prerequisite to the Subject's prerequisites ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      prerequisite - the subjectIDs of the subjects you have to take before studying this one

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a pretty-print string of the Subject, containing all its details.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a table-formatted string containing the subject's name, ID, specialism, duration (in days) and prerequisites
